About Me
item.description: I am a Senior Software Engineer with over ten years of experience writing, debugging, and managing software systems at scale. From single-page applications to backend microservices, and from large-scale data ingestion to cloud infrastructure, my experience puts me in the perfect positions to help you solve your problems. As a native Texan, I was raised in a culture of hard work and accountability. After graduating from the University of Texas at Austin, I went on to learn systems, front end, and backend software from many talented coworkers at Freescale, HP, and IBM.
